results.name: a(n) = 3^n - 4.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-3).
program: (MAGMA) I:=[-3, -1]; [n le 2 select I[n] else 4*Self(n-1)-3*Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 06 2012
results.author: _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 01 2009
ext: Formula and examples edited to use correct offset by _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Jun 19 2010
